body.gatha1: Tattha tattha vipassitvā, phusitvā accutaṃ padaṃ;
body.title: 1. Paṭhamavaggo
body.gatha1: ‘‘Channā me kuṭikā sukhā nivātā, vassa deva yathāsukhaṃ;
body.gathalast: Cittaṃ me susamāhitaṃ vimuttaṃ, ātāpī viharāmi vassa devā’’ti.
body.paragraph: Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā subhūtitthero gāthaṃ abhāsitthāti.
Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā mahākoṭṭhikomahākoṭṭhito thero gāthaṃ abhāsitthāti.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Paññaṃ imaṃ passa tathāgatānaṃ, aggi yathā pajjalito nisīthe;
body.gathalast: Ālokadā cakkhudadā bhavanti, ye āgatānaṃ vinayanti kaṅkha’’nti.
body.paragraph: Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā kaṅkhārevato thero gāthaṃ abhāsitthāti.
body.gatha2: Atthaṃ mahantaṃ gambhīraṃ, duddasaṃ nipuṇaṃ aṇuṃ;
body.paragraph: Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā puṇṇo mantāṇiputtomantāniputto thero gāthaṃ abhāsitthāti.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Yo duddamiyo damena danto, dabbo santusito vitiṇṇakaṅkho;
body.gathalast: Vijitāvī apetabheravo hi, dabbo so parinibbuto ṭhitatto’’ti.
body.paragraph: Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā dabbo thero gāthaṃ abhāsitthāti.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Yo sītavanaṃ upagā bhikkhu, eko santusito samāhitatto;
body.paragraph: Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā sītavaniyo thero gāthaṃ abhāsitthāti.
body.gathalast: Vijitāvī apetabheravo hi, danto so parinibbuto ṭhitatto’’ti.
body.paragraph: Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā bhalliyo thero gāthaṃ abhāsitthāti.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Yo duddamiyo damena danto, vīro santusito vitiṇṇakaṅkho;
body.gathalast: Vijitāvī apetalomahaṃso, vīro so parinibbuto ṭhitatto’’ti.
body.paragraph: Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā vīro thero gāthaṃ abhāsitthāti.
Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā pilindavacchopilindivaccho thero gāthaṃ abhāsitthāti.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Vihari apekkhaṃ idha vā huraṃ vā, yo vedaūū samito yatatto;
body.gathalast: Sabbesu dhammesu anūpalitto, lokassa jaññā udayabbayañcā’’ti.
body.paragraph: Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā puṇṇamāso thero gāthaṃ abhāsitthāti.
body.gatha2: Mantāṇiputto dabbo ca, sītavaniyo ca bhalliyo;
body.title: 2. Dutiyavaggo
body.gathalast: Yadatthiyaṃ bhojanaṃ bhuñjamāno, kaṅkhetha kālaṃ idha vītarāgo’’ti.
body.gatha2: Gāme me vasati kāyo, araññaṃ me gato mano;
body.gatha1: ‘‘Pañca chinde pañca jahe, pañca cuttari bhāvaye;
‘‘Middhī yadā hoti mahagghaso ca, niddāyitā samparivattasāyī;
dha. pa. 80, 145 dhammapadepi‘‘Udakaṃ hi nayanti nettikā, usukārā namayantidamayanti tejanaṃ;
body.gathalast: Dāruṃ namayanti tacchakā, attānaṃ damayanti subbatā’’ti.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Maraṇe me bhayaṃ natthi, nikanti natthi jīvite;
body.gatha2: Kuṇḍadhāno ca belaṭṭhi, dāsako ca tatopari;
body.gathalast: Siṅgālapitiko thero, kulo ca ajito dasāti.
body.title: 3. Tatiyavaggo
body.gatha1: ‘‘Nāhaṃ bhayassa bhāyāmi, satthā no amatassa kovido;
body.gathalast: Yattha bhayaṃ nāvatiṭṭhati, tena maggena vajanti bhikkhavo’’ti.
Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana’’nti.
Paccabyadhiṃ hi nipuṇaṃ, vālaggaṃ usunā yathā’’ti.
Kacci sīlamayaṃ gandhaṃ, kiṃ tvaṃ vāyasi netarā pajā’’ti.
Cittaṃ ujuṃ karitvāna, avijjaṃ bhinda hāritā’’ti.
Ābādho me samuppanno, kālo me nappamajjitu’’nti.
body.title: 4. Catutthavaggo
body.gathalast: Evaṃ sabbesu pāṇesu, sabbattha kusalo siyā’’ti.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Sukhaṃ sukhattho labhate tadācaraṃ, kittiñca pappoti yasassa vaḍḍhati;
body.gathalast: Yo ariyamaṭṭhaṅgikamañjasaṃ ujuṃ, bhāveti maggaṃ amatassa pattiyā’’ti.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Sādhu sutaṃ sādhu caritakaṃ, sādhu sadā aniketavihāro;
‘‘Yo iddhiyā sarabhuṃ aṭṭhapesi, so gavampati asito anejo;
body.gathalast: Taṃ sabbasaṅgātigataṃ mahāmuniṃ, devā namassanti bhavassa pāragu’’nti.
body.gatha1: saṃ. ni. 1.21, 97‘‘Sattiyā viya omaṭṭho, ḍayhamānovaḍayhamāneva matthake;
body.title: 5. Pañcamavaggo
body.gathalast: Nagavivaragato ca jhāyati, putto appaṭimassa tādino’’ti.
body.gatha1: (cālā upacālā, sīsūpacālā) (ka.) patissatāpaṭissatikā nu kho viharatha;
body.gathalast: Asitāsu mayā naṅgalāsu, mayā khuddakuddālāsu mayā.
body.gatha1: Yadipi idhameva idhameva, atha vāpi alameva alameva;
body.gathalast: Jhāya sumaṅgala jhāya sumaṅgala, appamatto vihara sumaṅgalā’’ti.
body.gatha1: saṃ. ni. 1.239‘‘Mataṃ vā amma rodanti, yo vā jīvaṃ na dissati;
body.gathalast: Jīvantaṃ maṃ amma passantī, kasmā maṃ amma rodasī’’ti.
body.gatha2: Sati paññāca me vuḍḍhā, cittañca susamāhitaṃ;
body.gathalast: Na me taṃ phandati cittaṃ, ekattanirataṃ hi me’’ti.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Dharaṇī ca siñcati vāti, māluto vijjutā carati nabhe;
body.gathalast: Rāmaṇeyyo ca so thero, vimalo ca raṇañjahoti.
body.title: 6. Chaṭṭhavaggo
body.gatha1: ‘‘Vassati devo yathā sugītaṃ, channā me kuṭikā sukhā nivātā;
body.gathalast: Cittaṃ susamāhitañca mayhaṃ, atha ce patthayasi pavassa devā’’ti.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Vassati devo yathā sugītaṃ, channā me kuṭikā sukhā nivātā;
body.gathalast: Cittaṃ susamāhitañca kāye,atha ce patthayasi pavassa devā’’ti.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Vassati devo yathā sugītaṃ, channā me kuṭikā sukhā nivātā;
body.gathalast: Tassaṃ viharāmi appamatto, atha ce patthayasi pavassa devā’’ti.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Vassati devo yathā sugītaṃ, channā me kuṭikā sukhā nivātā;
body.gathalast: Tassaṃ viharāmi adutiyo, atha ce patthayasi pavassa devā’’ti.
Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana’’nti.
Evaṃ jānāhi āvuso, amoghā te kuṭikā katā’’ti.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Ayamāhu purāṇiyā kuṭi, aññaṃ patthayase navaṃ kuṭiṃ;
body.gathalast: Āsaṃ kuṭiyā virājaya, dukkhā bhikkhu puna navā kuṭī’’ti.
Na me attho kumārīhi, yesaṃ attho tahiṃ gacchatha nāriyo’’ti.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Te me ijjhiṃsu saṅkappā, yadattho pāvisiṃ kuṭiṃ;
Godhiko ca subāhu ca, valliyo uttiyo isi;
body.title: 7. Sattamavaggo
body.gatha1: ‘‘Ekakā mayaṃ araññe viharāma, apaviddhaṃva vanasmiṃ dārukaṃ;
body.gathalast: Tassa me bahukā pihayanti, nerayikā viya saggagāmina’’nti.
Kataṃ kiccaṃ rataṃ rammaṃ, sukhenanvāgataṃ sukha’’nti.
body.gatha2: Tassāhaṃ dhammaṃ sutvāna, vihāsiṃ santike sato;
body.gathalast: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana’’nti.
body.gatha1: udā. 37; pāci. 153‘‘Adhicetaso appamajjato, munino monapathesu sikkhato;
body.gathalast: Sokā na bhavanti tādino, upasantassa sadā satīmato’’ti.
Maggaṃ papajjiṃpapajjaṃ amatassa pattiyā, so yogakkhemassa pathassa kovido’’ti.
body.gatha1: Vappo ca vajjiputto ca, pakkho vimalakoṇḍañño;
body.title: 8. Aṭṭhamavaggo
body.gatha1: ‘‘Yathā kaḷīro susu vaḍḍhitaggo, dunnikkhamo hoti pasākhajāto;
body.gathalast: Evaṃ ahaṃ bhariyāyānitāya, anumaññaṃ maṃ pabbajitomhi dānī’’ti.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Jiṇṇañca disvā dukhitañca byādhitaṃ, matañca disvā gatamāyusaṅkhayaṃ;
body.gathalast: Tato ahaṃ nikkhamitūna pabbajiṃ, pahāya kāmāni manoramānī’’ti.
Uddhaccaṃ vicikicchā ca, sabbasova na vijjatī’’ti.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Sādhu suvihitāna dassanaṃ, kaṅkhā chijjati buddhi vaḍḍhati;
body.gathalast: Bālampi karonti paṇḍitaṃ, tasmā sādhu sataṃ samāgamo’’ti.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Idaṃ pure cittamacāri cārikaṃ, yenicchakaṃ yatthakāmaṃ yathāsukhaṃ;
body.gathalast: Tadajjahaṃ niggahessāmi yoniso, hatthippabhinnaṃ viya aṅkusaggaho’’ti.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Sabbo rāgo pahīno me, sabbo doso samūhato;
body.gathalast: Sabbo me vigato moho, sītibhūtosmi nibbuto’’ti.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Yaṃ mayā pakataṃ kammaṃ, appaṃ vā yadi vā bahuṃ;
Vacchapālo ca yo thero, ātumo māṇavo isi;
body.gatha2: Suyāmano susārado, thero yo ca piyañjaho;
body.title: 9. Navamavaggo
body.gatha1: ‘‘Yaṃ mayā pakataṃ pāpaṃ, pubbe aññāsu jātisu;
body.gathalast: Idheva taṃ vedanīyaṃ, vatthu aññaṃ na vijjatī’’ti.
Tena puttaka gacchassu, mā sokāpahato bhavā’’ti.
Bhāvehi kusalaṃ dhammaṃ, jaha sīghaṃ samussaya’’nti.
Jhāyaṃ nipako patissato, adhigaccheyya sukhaṃ nirāmisa’’nti.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Ito bahiddhā puthu aññavādinaṃ, maggo na nibbānagamo yathā ayaṃ;
body.gathalast: Itissu saṅghaṃ bhagavānusāsati, satthā sayaṃ pāṇitaleva dassaya’’nti.
Mutto oghā ca ganthā ca, sabbe mānā visaṃhatā’’ti.
body.gatha2: Nīto sunāgo nāgito, paviṭṭho ajjuno isi;
body.gathalast: Devasabho ca yo thero, sāmidatto mahabbaloti.
body.title: 10. Dasamavaggo
body.gatha1: ‘‘Na tathā mataṃ satarasaṃ, sudhannaṃ yaṃ mayajja paribhuttaṃ;
body.gatha2: Suññatā animitto ca, vimokkho yassa gocaro;
body.gatha1: ‘‘Dukkhā kāmā eraka, na sukhā kāmā eraka;
body.gatha2: Yo kāme kāmayati, dukkhaṃ so kāmayati eraka;
body.gathalast: Yo kāme na kāmayati, dukkhaṃ so na kāmayati erakā’’ti.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Rūpaṃ disvā sati muṭṭhā, piyaṃ nimittaṃ manasikaroto;
‘‘Saddaṃ sutvā sati muṭṭhā, piyaṃ nimittaṃ manasikaroto;
Paripuṇṇako ca vijayo, erako mettajī muni;
body.gatha2: Cakkhupālo khaṇḍasumano, tisso ca abhayo tathā;
body.gathalast: Uttiyo ca mahāpañño, thero devasabhopi cāti.
body.title: 11. Ekādasamavaggo
body.gathalast: Pitvāpītvāna rasaggamuttamaṃ, na ca kāhāmi visena santhava’’nti.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Lahuko vata me kāyo, phuṭṭho ca pītisukhena vipulena;
body.gathalast: Tūlamiva eritaṃ mālutena, pilavatīva me kāyo’’ti.
Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana’’nti.
Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana’’nti.
Tathāhayaṃ viharati pākatindriyo, migī yathā taruṇajātikā vane’’ti.
Vivekakāmassa araññasaññino, janeti bhiyyo usabhassa kalyata’’nti.
body.title: 12. Dvādasamavaggo
body.gatha1: ‘‘Duppabbajjaṃ ve duradhivāsā gehā, dhammo gambhīro duradhigamā bhogā;
body.gathalast: Kicchā vutti no itarītareneva, yuttaṃ cintetuṃ satatamaniccata’’nti.
Sadattho me anuppatto, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana’’nti.
Tisso vijjā ajjhagamiṃ, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana’’nti.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Abhisattova nipatati, vayo rūpaṃ aññamiva tatheva santaṃ;
body.gatha2: Tasseva sato avippavasato, aññasseva sarāmi attāna’’nti.
Jhāya gotama mā ca pamādo, kiṃ te biḷibiḷikā karissatī’’ti.
body.gatha1: Jento ca vacchagotto ca, vaccho ca vanasavhayo;
